page.title: 07WHITEHILLS FARM
page.content: The farm of{217 acres}lies just outside Ceres,faces South and is on an exposed site.{ { The Farmer's Wife's Year. {January February}She helps with the lambing of the cross Suffolk flock and feeds weak lambs. {March April}She helps sow the turnips by checking the precision sowing machine. {June July}She helps turn the hay with the workman so that it dries properly. {August September}She drives a tractor to collect the grain from the combine harvester driven by her husband.The grain is taken to the cattle court. {Years end}She looks after the young calves-{Limosin Hereford crosses.}She also{cooks,entertains guests,}does all the{domestic work}and keeps the {financial records}in order.Without her the farm would not be as profitable.
